links_body:
You requested Tor Browser for {}.

You will need only one of the links below to download the bundle. If a link does not work for you, try the next one.

{}

 
--
GetTor
help_body:
This is how you can request a tor browser bundle link.

 Send an email to: gettor@torproject.org

In the body of the email only write: <operating system> <language>.

We only support windows, osx and linux as operating systems.

At the moment please only use en as language.
smtp_unsupported_locale_msg: The locale you requested '{}' is not supported.
smtp_vlinks_msg:
You requested Tor Browser for {}.

You will need only one of the links below to download the bundle. If a link does not work for you, try the next one.

{}

 
--
GetTor
smtp_mirrors_msg:
Hi! this is the GetTor robot.

Thank you for your request. Attached to this email you will find
an updated list of mirrors of Tor Project's website.
smtp_help_msg:
Hi! This is the GetTor robot. I am here to help you download the
latest version of Tor Browser.

Please reply to this message with one of the options below:

windows
linux
osx
mirrors

I will then send you the download instructions.

If you are unsure, just send a blank reply to this message.
